placeholder.name: Name
placeholder.clientId: Client Id as per value on Ambi Dev Portal
placeholder.clientSecret: Client Secret as per value on Ambi Dev Portal
placeholder.room_name: Room Name as defined within Ambi Climate App
placeholder.location_name: Location Name as defined within Ambi Climate App

error.unspecified_device: Device is neither specified in config or msg.payload:
error.undefined_feedback_value: Feedback value should be one of the defined value (too_hot , too_warm , bit_warm , comfortable , bit_cold , too_cold , freezing), this value is undefined:
error.invalid_paging_parameter: Paging parameters (limit and offset) must be an integer
error.no_deployment_parameter: There should be at least one deployment parameter, please check the README to learn more
